title: Crazy Like Us
content:
My guest Ethan Watters is the author of Crazy Like Us: The Globalization of the American Psyche. <!--more--> This is a donâ€™t-miss show, filled with insights and new information about the invasiveness of Western psychiatric diagnoses and drugs, as well about what other cultures have to teach us.
A really interesting conversation between the two of us about PTSD, ritual sexual abuse, multiple personalities, culture, human relationship, and, yes, the Psychopharmaceutical Complex.
